title: Grab IKEA’s $10 Fall-Inspired Decor Find Before It Disappears From Shelves
description: Your fall and Halloween decor won’t be complete without this set! READ MORE...
author: Olivia Harvey
excerpt: Your fall and Halloween decor won’t be complete without this set!

All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.Credit: Jujumin Chu/ShutterstockIKEA has already begun rolling out its new Halloween decor for October, but there’s an item in the KUSTFYR Halloween collection that has actually been on IKEA’s website for quite some time — and in fact, it’s about to vanish soon. It’s a set of three bright orange candlestick holders that are being phased out of IKEA’s home decor collection, so if you don’t pick them up while they’re in the KUSTFYR collection, you’ll miss out on them entirely!What Is The IKEA TUVKORNELL?The TUVKORNELL is a set of candleholders that come in bright orange (hence why it’s included in the Halloween collection). The set, which was initially designed and released in 1982, comes with different sizes that perfectly fit standard taper candles. Perfect for everyday use or the Halloween season — just imagine them paired with black or purple taper candles! — the TUVKORNELL is officially on its way out, so grab these candleholders now while they’re just $10 before they’re gone for good. If you’re on the fence, you’ll want to read what people wrote about these items. “I love everything about these orange candlestick holders: the simplicity, color, style, and PRICE! So much joy for $9.99!” one IKEA shopper wrote. Another said, “Who doesn’t love orange candle sticks. Perfect for fall, Thanksgiving decor. Love it!”And it’s difficult to find a similar style of taper holders in such a fun color. Amazon has orange glass candleholders, but they give off a totally different vibe than that of the TUVKORNELL set, although it could be fun to mix and match!Whether you’re stocking up on Halloween decor or just like the idea of having a fun pop of color on your dining room table, the IKEA TUVKORNELL candleholders are an inexpensive way to liven up your space. And since this is your last chance to buy them, grab the set now before it’s gone!

Olivia Harvey is a freelance writer and award-winning scriptwriter from outside Boston, Massachusetts. She’s a big fan of scented candles, getting dressed up, and the 2005 film adaptation of Pride and Prejudice starring Keira Knightley. You can make sure she’s doing okay via…read more

published about 8 hours ago

We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

IKEA has already begun rolling out its new Halloween decor for October, but there’s an item in the KUSTFYR Halloween collection that has actually been on IKEA’s website for quite some time — and in fact, it’s about to vanish soon. It’s a set of three bright orange candlestick holders that are being phased out of IKEA’s home decor collection, so if you don’t pick them up while they’re in the KUSTFYR collection, you’ll miss out on them entirely!

What Is The IKEA TUVKORNELL?

The TUVKORNELL is a set of candleholders that come in bright orange (hence why it’s included in the Halloween collection). The set, which was initially designed and released in 1982, comes with different sizes that perfectly fit standard taper candles. 

Perfect for everyday use or the Halloween season — just imagine them paired with black or purple taper candles! — the TUVKORNELL is officially on its way out, so grab these candleholders now while they’re just $10 before they’re gone for good. If you’re on the fence, you’ll want to read what people wrote about these items. 

“I love everything about these orange candlestick holders: the simplicity, color, style, and PRICE! So much joy for $9.99!” one IKEA shopper wrote. Another said, “Who doesn’t love orange candle sticks. Perfect for fall, Thanksgiving decor. Love it!”

And it’s difficult to find a similar style of taper holders in such a fun color. Amazon has orange glass candleholders, but they give off a totally different vibe than that of the TUVKORNELL set, although it could be fun to mix and match!

Whether you’re stocking up on Halloween decor or just like the idea of having a fun pop of color on your dining room table, the IKEA TUVKORNELL candleholders are an inexpensive way to liven up your space. And since this is your last chance to buy them, grab the set now before it’s gone!
